main event: A group of approximately 4 people reported seeing a glowing object in Bridge City, Texas, on July 22, 1968.
interesting points: The object emitted no sound and did not light up the surrounding area., The object was described as glowing and was observed for a length of time of about 3 minutes., The witness has experience as an amateur astronomer, which adds credibility to their observation., Multiple reports from Bridge City in 1968 indicate a pattern of UFO sightings., The sighting was reported to NASA and the U.S. Air Force for further investigation.
witness description: the witness is an amateur astronomer
